Editing Revision Comments

When you create a revision of an item or folder (for example, by checking in a file or changing its properties), you should provide a revision comment that explains what changes were made and why they were required. If desired, you can add to or edit that comment later from the History list.

To edit the revision comment for an item:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click a component tab.

  3. Select an item from the upper pane.

  4. Select the History tab from the lower pane. This action displays a list of item revisions.

  5. Right-click a revision from the History list. The History context menu opens.

  6. Click Edit Comment. The Edit Comment dialog displays the comment originally entered for the revision.

  7. Edit the comment, then click OK.

To edit the revision comment for a folder:

  1. Select the folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select Properties from the Folder or context menu.

  3. Select the History tab. (If you do not have access rights to the folder history, you will not be able to view this tab.)

  4. Right-click a revision from the History list. The History context menu opens.

  5. Click Edit Comment. The Edit Comment dialog displays the comment originally entered for the revision.

  6. Edit the comment, then click OK.
